author: M. J.
text: "I haven't even wanted to look at frozen yogurt since trying Amanda Banana months ago. I can't get enough! Do yourself a favor and track down the food truck (usually Pier 13 - Hoboken). ProTip - their dairy-free whip cream is the best I've ever had."

author: Yaniv Schwartz
text: 'Incredible texture and taste. The original one is one of the finest!'

author: Thomas Smith
column5: strawberries and granola.\nSweet enough and great on a summer day on the boardwalk.'

author: Queeng1226
text: 'Omg it was so goooood. Toppings are abundant and taste is amazing'

author: Ashleigh
text: 'We had this for work events. Very yummy & very nice  people.'

author: Lisa P
text: 'I love this ‚Äúice cream‚Äù it‚Äôs absolutely delicious. Whenever I come to Hoboken in the summer I stop here for a dessert! It‚Äôs a nice alternative to ice cream and tastes even better ! Great idea for ice cream!'

author: Jason Soto
text: "Coconut/Pineapple was awesome. Thank you for coming out and supporting Hero's Week in New Brunswick."

author: Ali Brinjak-Gray
text: "I was introduced to Amanda's Bananas when they brought one of their trucks over to my apt building for a building hosted block party. I had heard of the brand before and was anxious to try. A little about me
column5: I am currently on WW's and am someone who is always searching for a low point ice cream option that doesn't leave anything out. Amanda's has been the greatest discover on my journey! It tastes delicious
column6: has a wonderful ice cream texture and has a great selection of toppings. I am especially happy with the portion size and the amount of whipped cream that is given. Overall
column7: I try to make it over to Hoboken as often as I can for this delectable treat and hope you all expand in The City one day so that I can have the option to hit you up during my lunch hours. Thanks for making a great product!"

author: Stephen McSpirit II
text: 'Gave us a free doggy threat and there‚Äôs any type of topping you could want. Love it!'
